title: Can't set up new Pixel 4a (requests for PIN when I didn't create one yet)
content:
I can't seem to set up my new Pixel 4a (bought new, directly from Google). Here's what I did.

Turned on the device for the first time.
Realized I should probably put in my SIM card, so I turned the device off.
Inserted the SIM card.
Turned the device on.
It asks me to insert a PIN. I tried the PIN I used from my previous device (Pixel 3a), but it didn't work.

Now I'm stuck since I don't know what PIN I'm supposed to input.

Any help is appreciated. Thanks!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
